body:
This is a sub-set of #9235, including only the `rpc` and `script` dirs.

Same-binaries check:

```Bash
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py 2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201 d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx"
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/repo/src'
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201 /tmp/compare/d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
2827166eaec5c3f5517e0000f3afcecbd00911388a0ae4453297083050dd468b  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201.stripped
2827166eaec5c3f5517e0000f3afcecbd00911388a0ae4453297083050dd468b  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a.stripped
c4cb6d9fd017d14ccb6e92810401d242e2f718047c79c2cdcf52bef3a12e1608  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201.stripped
c4cb6d9fd017d14ccb6e92810401d242e2f718047c79c2cdcf52bef3a12e1608  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a.stripped
aabf6634d1e0c177dc9db924b8b3ad8d231cfff693b4adb97be6d66d536dce85  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201.stripped
aabf6634d1e0c177dc9db924b8b3ad8d231cfff693b4adb97be6d66d536dce85  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a.stripped
$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/2a524b8e8fe69ef487fd8ea1b4f7a03f473ed201 /tmp/compare/d02c62c4abd2c4fe85cbb3637ec06b44fee18e5a
$ 
```

The affected files and namespaces:
```
rpc/blockchain.cpp:       std
rpc/client.cpp:           std
rpc/mining.cpp:           std
rpc/misc.cpp:             std
rpc/net.cpp:              std
rpc/protocol.cpp:         std
rpc/rawtransaction.cpp:   std
rpc/server.cpp:           RPCServer [unused], std
script/interpreter.cpp:   std
script/ismine.cpp:        std
script/script.cpp:        std
script/sign.cpp:          std
script/standard.cpp:      std
```
title: Refactor: Remove using namespace <xxx> from rpc/ & script/ sources
